title: [水桶服]昨天还可以开服务器的,今天进不去了.....求大神
author: FreshMilk
txt_content:
在开完服务器,也就是done之后,出现这些文字
2013/2/23 17:14:35 [INFO] Done (1.925s)! For help, type "help" or "?"
2013/2/23 17:14:36 [INFO] [Metrics] Server returned HTTP response code: 502 for URL: http://mcstats.org/report/Lift
2013/2/23 17:14:41 [INFO] [Backup] Plugin is up to date, at version: 2.0.

2013/2/23 17:15:34 [SEVERE] [Metrics] Server returned HTTP response code: 502 for URL: http://mcstats.org/report/Spigot


5555,刚准备和朋友们一起玩呢

replies.author: FreshMilk
replies.txt_content: 客户端那边就是一直"正在连接服务器",过一会就"time out:connect

replies.author: strawmaine
replies.txt_content:
又是Spigot。。。
服务端哪来的？

replies.txt_content:
同问，我也是用MCPC，这两天也出这样的问题。
01.12 22:34:41 [Server] INFO Server returned HTTP response code: 502 for URL: http://mcstats.org/report/CraftGuard
不知道是什么原因。
